subject: Olympic Games (2012)
Television
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: Dave Mazza, the engineer in chief for NBC Olympics, oversees the installation of the network’s control rooms and servers that will bring roughly 325 hours’ worth of video a day to the United States.
snippet: Dave Mazza, the engineer in chief for NBC Olympics, oversees the installation of the network’s control rooms and servers that will bring roughly 325 hours’ worth of video a day to the United States.
